statements: DELETE FROM website_personalization WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM website_personalization WHERE user_id = 100 AND user_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM website_personalization WHERE pages_visited > 10 AND user_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND dark_mode = true;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE date_visited < NOW() - interval '7 days';
DELETE FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' AND username = 'JohnDoe';
DELETE FROM Users WHERE age < 18 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
